title: Gravity Vortex (Part 4)
body:
Gravity Vortex (Part 4)

Evan backed away and his appearance began to change. In no time, his height increased from 185 cm to three meters. His black eyes turned blood red in colour. Two dark red horns sprouted from his head, his hands turned into beastly claws, and his body became more muscular. A rune flashed on his sunfire armour and it adjusted itself according to Evan's new height.

Evan felt infinite power welling up inside him as he merged himself with the shadow undead of the B+ rank Minotaur.

Feeling the endless power, Evan wasn't able to hold himself back and roared out loud.

ROAR -!

His powerful roar shook the surrounding area, and even Adam, who was blinded by rage, felt every hair on his body stand up to no end.

Woosh-!

Evan flapped his black wings, a black light flashed, and before Adam could react Evan appeared in front of him.

Booooommmm-!
